segments.text: Taking in the kitchen, it's a typical daytime setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman by the sink, apron on, focused on chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet's running, but she's not reacting to the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, water down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's labeled clearly— they're after treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool looks unstable, but he's holding a plate steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm up, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window shows a neat garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, almost done with washing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that overflow— it's going to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR
